TestDescriptor.Name: QName support for element or attribute value
TestDescriptor.Author: Arnaud Blandin
TestDescriptor.Comment: The aim of this test is to ensure that QName values are supported inside the Marshalling Framework when used with a mapping file. To enable the QName support the 'type' attribute of the 'bind-xml' element must be set to 'QName' and an OPTIONAL 'QName-prefix' can bet set. The in-memory value of a QName is '{Namespace URI}value'.
